oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Local paper. Folios in fair condition, slightly worm-eaten.
Written in black ink, sanded to prevent ink runs, 7 lines per page.
Single section stab-sewn through fold and into paper covers.
F. 1r dated 1 Posh 1886 s./1829 and f. 21r dated 2 (?) Māhā 1886 s./1829.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
